CustomField.description:
Dropdown option on the signature request detail record. Values: Sent: Created when the agreement has been sent a specific signer. Condition: Ordered Signers → in the case of N total signers in an order, when signer(N-1) has "signed" then immeditaly "sent" would occur for signer (N) Condition: Non-ordered signers → in the case of N total signers, in no order, upon sending the request each N signer should be documented as "Sent"
Viewed: Created when the agreement has been opened by a particular signer.
Signed: Created when the agreement has been signed by a specific signer
Declined: Created when the agreement has been successfully declined by signer including adding in a comment
CustomField.label: Event
